clamdb 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Query Systematic Compounds

    query_systematic_compounds.Rd

    Query Systematic Compounds

    query_systematic_compounds(
  systematic_compounds_con,
  systematicCompoundIds = NULL,
  db_update_version = "recent"
)

    Arguments

    systematic_compounds_con

    A connection to an SQL database which stores the structure and systematic IDs of well-studied compounds.

    systematicCompoundIds

    NULL to query all compounds or a numeric vector of systematic compound IDs

    db_update_version

    multiple versions of the database exist that can be differentiated by update date.

    all

    Queries all versions of the database. This is useful when previously-created systematicCompoundIds need to be matched

    recent

    Queries the most recent version of the database. This is useful when matching to compounds by name or structure.

    YYYY-MM-DD

    Provide a specific date with the format YYYY-MM-DD to query database entries from this date.

    Value

    a list containing:

    distinct_compounds

    unique database entries

    database_ids

    systematic IDs of compounds in KEGG, HMDB, ...

    compound_aliases

    alternative names for a compound

    metabolic_pathways

    KEGG pathways associated with a metabolite

    Contents

    Developed by Sean Hackett, Phillip Seitzer.
